definitions.definition: A Greek mythological deity , the god of doctors , medicine and healing ; a son of Apollo and the Thessalian princess Coronis , husband to the goddess Epione and father of the Asclepiades ; identified with the Roman god Aesculapius .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) A Greek mythological deity , the god of doctors , medicine and healing ; a son of Apollo and the Thessalian princess Coronis , husband to the goddess Epione and father of the Asclepiades ; identified with the Roman god Aesculapius .
